test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg(1, "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(avg(()))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((3, 3, 3)) eq 3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((-3, -3, -3)) eq -3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), xs:integer(3), xs:float(3))) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), xs:integer(3), xs:decimal(3))) instance of xs:float`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), xs:integer(3), xs:double(3))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:integer(1), xs:integer(3), xs:decimal(3))) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), xs:integer(0), xs:float(5))) eq 2.0`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), xs:integer(0), xs:untypedAtomic(-4))) eq -1`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), xs:integer(0), xs:untypedAtomic(3))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:untypedAtomic(3), xs:integer(0), xs:decimal(1))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((3, 3, xs:double("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((3, xs:double("NaN"), 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-16
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((xs:double("NaN"), 3, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(avg(()))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-18
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(avg(((), ())))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-19
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((-5, -0, -3, -6)) eq -3.5`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-20
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((1, 2, 3, xs:float("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-21
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((1, 2, 3, xs:double("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-22
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((xs:double("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-23
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((xs:float("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-24
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((1, 2, xs:double("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-25
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((1, 2, xs:float("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-26
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg(xs:untypedAtomic("3")) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-27
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((1, 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-28
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((1, 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) eq 2`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-29
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) eq 2`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-30
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(1), 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-31
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg("a string")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-32
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg(xs:anyURI("a string"))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-33
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((1, 2, 3, xs:anyURI("a string"), xs:double("NaN")))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-34
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg("a string")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-35
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:untypedAtomic(3), xs:integer(3), xs:string(1)))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-36
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:string(1), xs:integer(3), xs:untypedAtomic(3)))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-37
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:float(2), xs:integer(3), "a string", xs:double(2)))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-38
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:yearMonthDuration("P20Y"), (3, 4, 5)))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-39
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((xs:yearMonthDuration("P20Y"), xs:yearMonthDuration("P10M"))) eq xs:yearMonthDuration("P125M")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-40
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(avg( () ))`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-41
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg((xs:float('INF'), xs:float('-INF')))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-42
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(avg(((3, 4, 5), xs:float('NaN')))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqAVGFunc-43
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `avg((3, 4, 5)) eq 4.0`.
